title: Fifty Six LilyPads!
text:
Take turns placing your frogs on any lilypad with a fly.




Click to select a frog.
Click a destination to move the frog. > Frogs follow paths but can’t jump over each other. Lilypads are destroyed after a frog leaves. Collect 1 point per fly, 5 points for a lotus.
Next player moves.

The game ends when no moves are left for either player.
